function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in compliance globally","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 due to inconsistent adherence to mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Implement standardized guidelines and communication strategies to improve global compliance","Technologies":"Communication technologies for widespread dissemination of guidelines and information","People":"Global population, public health authorities","Owner":"International health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","Impact":"Unequal adherence to measures based on individual personality traits, leading to potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Design targeted interventions to address specific personality traits influencing compliance","Technologies":"Behavioral science techniques, targeted messaging and communication strategies","People":"Individuals, public health authorities","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Association of political orientation with compliance","Impact":"Polarized adherence to measures based on political beliefs, leading to uneven containment efforts","Mitigation":"Implement bipartisan messaging and education to promote universal compliance, regardless of political orientation","Technologies":"Social media platforms, targeted advertising, bipartisan communication strategies","People":"Political affiliations, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
